bug.short_desc: Request: qx.ui.toolbar.MenuButton should keep it's pressed state when displaying the menu.

long_desc.thetext:
Hi there.
I think the qx.ui.toolbar.MenuButton should keep it's pressed state when displaying the menu.
Thanks! :)
